author: parithosh
content:
We had multiple competing miners pre TTD and the eth1 chain had forked off. Some nodes observed a different terminal block than the others. However, the nodes did later on agree on just one terminal block and I guess re-orged to the correct chain as expected. So yaaay resilience ðŸ˜„

The chain is continuing  and finalizing as expected. Our beaconexplorer however relies on a lighthouse node, so we are unable to set one up at this time. The remaining tooling can be found here: https://devnet4.themerge.dev/

content: Nice! How long did it take nodes to re-org to the correct chain, and how "deep" was the re-org?
